answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The teacher gave some work yesterday

Penjelasan:

Karena kata give nya di kurung jadi saya pikir harus diubah menjadi past tense ^^

Semoga bermanfaat ^^

-Lily ✨

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some works yesterday

Penjelasan:

Kita menggunakan past tense jika waktu sudah lewat, misal nya I ate this food yesterday, otomatis kan sudh kemarin jadi pakai pas tense

Maaf kalau salah yaa\

-Clarissa

related_questions.question:
Bantuin gua dong plisss, yang ngerti dan pinter Bahasa Inggris nya    How Day and Night Happen

In this world, as we already know when the sunlight shines, we all call it a day. and when there's no sunlight, we all call it a night. but how it happens?

day happens when the sun is above us or there's a sunlight. but it's not all part of the Earth that is being hitten by the sunlight. and the part of earth that isn't being hitten by the sun, we call it a night. actually, it's not the sun that's spinning around the earth as we usually see. but, it is the earth that spins around the sun.

so, part of earth that's facing the sun, there's a day. meanwhile, the part of earth that's not facing the sun, there's a night.

1. Identify the generic structure of the text
2. Write the sentence using 
a. Present simple
b. Conjunction
c. Passive​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Bagaimana Siang dan Malam Terjadi

Di dunia ini, seperti yang sudah kita ketahui kapan sinar matahari bersinar, kita semua menyebutnya sehari. dan ketika tidak ada sinar matahari, kita semua menyebutnya malam. tapi bagaimana itu terjadi?

hari terjadi ketika matahari berada di atas kita atau ada sinar matahari. tapi tidak semua bagian bumi yang terkena sinar matahari. dan bagian bumi yang tidak terkena matahari, kita sebut malam. sebenarnya bukan matahari yang berputar mengelilingi bumi seperti yang biasa kita lihat. tapi, itu adalah bumi yang berputar mengelilingi matahari.

jadi, bagian bumi yang menghadap matahari, ada hari. sedangkan bagian bumi yang tidak menghadap matahari adalah malam.

so, part of earth that's facing the sun, there's a day. meanwhile, the part of earth that's not facing the sun, there's a night.

jadi, bagian bumi yang menghadap matahari, ada hari. sedangkan bagian bumi yang tidak menghadap matahari adalah malam.

jadi, bagian bumi yang menghadap matahari, ada hari. sedangkan bagian bumi yang tidak menghadap matahari adalah malam.

related_questions.question:
Bludy    Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?
A. at the hotel
B. at the beach
C. at the castle
D. at aunt vicky's house​

answers.answer:
bludy
Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?


C. at the castle

Jawaban:

D. at aunt vicky's house

Penjelasan:

Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday.

semoga membantu
